CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Referral_Partner_ID__c ) , null , HYPERLINK("https://www.solutionreach.com/referral-partner-demo?affiliate_id__c=" & Referral_Partner_ID__c , "https://www.solutionreach.com/referral-partner-demo?affiliate_id__c=" & Referral_Partner_ID__c ))
CustomField.label: Tracking Link
